CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(CloseDate), 1, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),2,1)-1 , 2, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),5,1)-1, 3, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),5,1)-1, 4, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),5,1)-1, 5, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),8,1)-1, 6, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),8,1)-1, 7, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),8,1)-1, 8, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),11,1)-1, 9, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),11,1)-1, 10, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate),11,1)-1, 11, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate)+1,2,1)-1, 12, DATE(YEAR(CloseDate)+1,2,1)-1, null )
CustomField.label: Closed Date Quarter Last Day Old
